name: nats-trigger
title: Receive NATS.io Messages
author: R.I.Pienaar <rip@devco.net>
description: Receives messages from a NATS.io cluster

settings.name: servers
settings.description: The NATS cluster to connect to

settings.name: credentials
settings.description: If connect using NATS 2.0 credentials the local path with the credentials

settings.name: tls_key
settings.description: If connecting to a server with private certs the path to your TLS key

settings.name: tls_cert
settings.description: If connecting to a server with private certs the path to your TLS certificate

settings.name: tls_ca
settings.description: If connecting to a server with private certs the path to your TLS CA

settings.name: topic
settings.description: The NATS topic on which to listen for messages
